Title: Development Arrested
Plot: After returning home from Iraq, George Sr. is finally cleared of all charges, and Michael is relieved to be the head of a successful company for a change. The real brains behind the madness is revealed, and just as the family begins to celebrate their victory, a whole new set of problems emerge.
GuestStars: Jim Cramer, Bill Rutkowski, J.J. Wall, Somer Dice, Brandon Hilluam
